body: At New York City's eastern frontier, dividing the Cape Cods and Tudor homes of Queens from the Cape Cods and Tudor homes of Long Island, there is a commercial strip dotted with old standbys like the Bellerose Old-Fashioned Butcher, new arrivals like the Indian beauty shop, and boarded-up storefronts waiting for another chance. title: One Street, Two Names and an Identity Crisis; A Proposal to Ease Confusion Touches Off a Fierce Feud Among Neighbors in Queens

body: The tip came from a Manhattan movie theater usher. The detectives quickly put a tail on the culprit, a tall man with a backpack, tracking him to Brooklyn. They surreptitiously watched his house for days. Then, the detectives said, they made a series of undercover buys, building evidence to obtain a search warrant. The man detectives were hunting
title: Stalking the Video Pirates; A Special Squad Moves In on the Movie Counterfeiters
